entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
